A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
NO SPOILERS ---
The latest SW film is a visual treat\, full of excitement and world-building. It's surprisingly heavier on personal stories over spectacle\, but doesn't skimp on spectacle either.

There are a few plot head-scratchers or possible holes and characters we are told to like\, but not given a reason to\, but beyond that\, it's a great movie.
